title: New irelia is bad.
body:
Stop reworking good champs into anime champs.

Swain and now Irelia

stop

replies.body: You don’t even know da abilities 😂

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HKJuW6A8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-20T05:46:36.468+0000)
>
> You don’t even know da abilities 😂

Just ignore this guy he complains about everything thing
What 😂, do ya know what complaining is my boy?

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HKJuW6A8,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-20T23:37:22.336+0000)
>
> What 😂, do ya know what complaining is my boy?

Sure I do but since I guess you don’t here you go 

“express dissatisfaction or annoyance about something.“
And when did I do that, I merely stated that the fellow doesn’t know what it does yet aka a helpful suggestion

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HKJuW6A8,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-21T06:29:26.221+0000)
>
> And when did I do that, I merely stated that the fellow doesn’t know what it does yet aka a helpful suggestion

He was talking about me because I'm the only one that calls Riot out on their questionable decisions.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HKJuW6A8,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-21T06:55:03.925+0000)
>
> He was talking about me because I'm the only one that calls Riot out on their questionable decisions.

What you call questionable others call logical. As it stands irelia is just a stat check champ which a stun that lacks game play clarity.  Also not sure how you can call that good by any means and on top of that they aren’t turning champs into “ anime champs” as u call it. It’s called fantasy nothing in league is possible. Hell the only really anime is the star guardian skins referencing sailor moon and super galaxy skins referencing gurren lagann and a couple of smaller ones like neon vi recall is a reference to Franky from one piece and Ezreal's dance is from Haruhi (Hare Hare Yukai).

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HKJuW6A8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-20T05:46:36.468+0000)
>
> You don’t even know da abilities 😂

https://twitter.com/LeagueOfLegends/status/975753080170954753/video/1

LOOK AT THIS WEEB NONSENSE
They even use a script to post their trailer. I guess they allow scripting in the game? lul
the champ has been the same since release (skill wise), I'm pretty sure they need reworks to keep the game as fresh as possible whether you like it or not

Basing a 'Japanese' character off an incredibly popular Japanese cultural style?

 **Outrageous!** 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
Next you'll be telling me that the Shuriman characters were based off 
Egyptian cultural icons...
